machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G28 ;Home
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 X10.1 Y20 Z0.28 F5000 ;Move to start
G1 X10.1 Y200 Z0.28 F1500 E15 ;Draw first line
G1 X10.4 Y200 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move over a bit
G1 X10.4 Y20 Z20.28 F1500.0 E30 ;Draw second line
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 Z15 ;Lower Z 15mm
G1 X150 Y150 ;Move to center to start print

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M104 S0
;Turn off Extruder
M140 S0
;Turn off Bed
;Turn off Fan
M106 S0
;Move nozzle away while extracting
G91
G1 X-2 Y-2 E-3 F300
;Lower Bed 10mm
G1 Z10 F3000
; Move print head out of the way and bed down
G90
G0 X280 Y280
G0 Z250
